Package uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.condition.conditions

Default implementations for commonly needed media player conditions used with the synchronous programming framework.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LengthChangedCondition
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that the media length has changed.
    ParsedCondition
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that media has been parsed.
    PausedCondition
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that it is paused.
    PlayingCondition
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that it is playing.
    PositionReachedCondition
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that it has reached/passed a particular position.
    SnapshotTakenCondition
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that it has finished taking a snapshot.
    TimeReachedCondition
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that it has reached/passed a particular point in time.
    VideoOutputCreatedCondition
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that a video output has been created.

Package uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.condition.conditions Description

Default implementations for commonly needed media player conditions used with the synchronous programming framework.
